【科學論文競賽】
"Sustainable Ecosystem for Resilient and Inclusive Life in the Digital Era"

This is an invitation from the Office of International Affairs, Universitas Swadaya Gunung Jati (UGJ)! 

We would like to inform you about the scientific paper competition on the theme "Sustainable Ecosystem for Resilient and Inclusive Life in the Digital Era." The competition encourages participants to develop solutions that combine technology and sustainability to create resilient and inclusive ecosystems.

The registration deadline is 7th December 2024. 

To register, please fill out the form here:
https://bit.ly/RegistrationKTIMI

Full papers should be submitted via:
https://bit.ly/SubmitFullPaperKTIMI

For more information contact UGJ on +62855-2355-6268
